p: The filamentous fungi strains were isolated from decomposition leaves harvested in Buritizal stream located in -10 15' 51,91040” latitude and -48 06' 54,7474” longitude, Palmas city, State Tocantins, Brazil. The microorganisms were cultured in Potato Dextrose Agar (PDA) media (potato extract: 4.0 g; dextrose: 20.0 g; agar: 15.0 g), supplemented with 0.1 μg/mL chloramphenicol, and incubated at 28°C for 7 days.
